column2: Establish Great Dynasty
Your family has gained much renown with you at its helm. Your exploits will never be forgotten.
Continence
The exercise of self constraint in sexual matters
Adapt Continence
You may adapt sexual abstinence as your state of life. No longer possible to visit bedchambers of your wife.
Enjoy Pleasures of Life
Sexual restraint is no longer your state of life.
Upgrade Regional Infrastructure.
Upgrade Provincial Road Network.
Offer Oath of Fealty
This decision gives a King the ability to form an Empire-tier title, so you may swear fealty to them.
Form the Principality of Driftmark
Establish a new exclave of the Freehold. Stay independent or become a legal vassal of Valyria.
Employ a Great Warrior
Bring a legendary warrior to your court.
Name as your Page
Name the target character as being one of your pages. It is a trait that will expire upon reaching the age of sixteen.
Name as your Squire
Name the target character as being one of your squires. It will last for the rest of their life or until they are Knighted.
[This.GetTitle] [This.GetFirstNameWithDynasty] must control at least 4 Kingdoms of Westeros.\n
Proclaim the Kingdom of Westeros
By virtue of your power, you can proclaim yourself King of the Andals, the Rhoynar and the First Men, Lord of the Seven Kingdoms and Protector of the Realm!
column3: En vertu de votre puissance, vous pouvez vous proclamer Roi des Andals, du Rhoynar et des Premiers Hommes, Seigneur des Sept Couronnes et Protecteur du Royaume!
column6: En virtud de tu poder, puedes proclamarte Rey de los �ndalos, de los Rhoynar y de los Primeros Hombres, Se�or de los Siete Reinos y Protector del Reino!

column2: Your old High Kingdoms will be forfeit.
Adopt Andal Customs
Coming from the northern coast of Essos, the cultural ways of the Andals has spread to my realm. Do I accept their traditions and way of life?
You introduce the way of the Andals to your realm, as they follow your new customs.
